body: As the most dense and brash of the genies, shaitans like games of chance and physical skill best of all. Should the caster offer services in exchange for a throw of the dice or a wrestling match—and go through with the offer—he'll receive a +2 bonus on his Charisma check.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Outsider Categories/Elementals and Genies/Shaitan
name: Shaitan
